mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM -1 AS ROWNUM, ta.b_id as bId, ta.b_title as bTitle, ta.b_content as bContent, ta.b_writer as bWriter, ta.b_datetime as bDatetime, ta.b_viewcount as bViewcount FROM lc_board ta, (SELECT @rownum := (SELECT COUNT(*)-#{pageNum}+1 FROM lc_board ta))tb LIMIT #{pageNum},5
